channel.title: Hugo ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ Bear on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ Bear on Alex's Blog

item.title: Memos导入历史数据
item.description: Memos 是我最近爱上使用的工具，是一个开源的自托管知识库，可以用来记录生活，编写日记等。 Github：https://github.com/usememos/memos 部署完成后，我在别的平台也写了很多文章，应该如何导入历史数据呢？

item.title: Hugo如何使用?
item.description: 作为一个经常逛技术论坛、博客的人，很羡慕大神们都有一个非常炫酷的主页，我也很想搭建一个博客。同时作为一位后端程序员，我对前端技术只限于HTML，查阅了很多资料，终于找到一个非常适合小白入门的博客，那就是 Hugo 1. Hugo 是什么？ 主页：https://gohugo.io/ Github：https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo Hugo 是最流行的开源静态站点生成器之一。 凭借其惊人的速度和灵活性，Hugo 让构建网站再次变得有趣。 2. 如何使用 Hugo ？ 2.1 下载安装 Hugo 下载地址：https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 将源码包下载完成后，放置至任意路径，随后将该目录添加至环境变量即可。 2.2 新建一个网站 E:\>hugo new site mywebsite Congratulations! Your new Hugo site was created in E:\GitHub\mywebsite. Just a few more steps... 1. Change the current directory to E:\GitHub\mywebsite. 2. Create or install a theme: - Create a new theme with the command "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" - Install a theme from https://themes.

item.title: About
item.description: 1. 个人介绍 const author = { name: '陈某', create_date: 1997, tags: ['后端程序员', '运维工程师', '数码爱好者'], address: '广州', email: 'alexchan0325@gmail.com', blog: 'https://danielchan-25.github.io', introduce: '一个不喜欢打工的人。' }

item.title: Bear
item.description: Bear Website: https://bearblog.dev There is a website obesity crisis. Bloated websites are full of scripts, ads, and trackers slowing your readers down every time they try to read your well-crafted content. Bear is all you need to build a fantastic and optimized site or blog. It works perfectly on any viewing device. All you need to focus on is writing good content. Bear makes it simple to publish content online and grow an audience while keeping pages tiny, fast, and optimized for search engines.

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo Website: https://gohugo.io Written in Go, Hugo is an open-source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML, and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files, and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification, and support for Sass SCSS workflows. Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including:
